description:
### Special Halloween Edition ###

Halloween is over for this year, but you can still enjoy the spacial Halloween edition Coloring Book with all the Halloween-theme images. 

Coloring Book for webOS is a fun coloring activity for kids & kids of all ages. It has a variety of colors to use and show off your creativity. 

This will keep any young child busy for hours.  Going on a long trip in the car?  Are you trying to keep your child occupied?  Give your child your Palm Pre and open the Coloring Book

Share the pictures with your friends and family. A very simple and intuitive design makes the Coloring Book the perfect activity for your kids.

This is a cute educational game that increases the child's awareness and improves hand-eye coordination.

Enjoy!

Features:
- 20 pictures to color
- Use the back and the forward gestures to scroll between the pictures
- Shared your pictures via email
- Easy to clear coloring page and start over
- Undo last move
- Develops hand-eye coordination
- Tested on real kids
